LanguageData.EggPtarmiganUnfertilized.label: 松鸡蛋 (未受精.)
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized ptarmigan egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked。
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganFertilized.label: 松鸡蛋 (已受精.)
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganFertilized.description: Fertilized ptarmigan egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked。
LanguageData.Ptarmigan.label: 松鸡
LanguageData.Ptarmigan.description: A small gamebird notable for its feathered feet, to better survive in frigid temperatures。
LanguageData.Ptarmigan.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.Ptarmigan.tools.2.label: head
